metadata.title: Mario Kart World - Mario Kart Notes
metadata.description: Mario Kart character and vehicle data reference system

footer.disclaimer: Unofficial tool based on community data @Upfloor5

descriptions.combinations: Create and manage character + vehicle combinations
descriptions.recommendations: Get optimal combinations based on terrain characteristics

descriptions.roadSpeedDesc: Road: Concrete, asphalt, metal and other smooth surfaces
descriptions.terrainSpeedDesc: Off-Road: Mud, sand, snow and other rough terrain
descriptions.waterSpeedDesc: Water: Water areas that activate underwater kart mode
descriptions.accelerationDesc: Acceleration: Time to reach top speed from standstill
descriptions.weightDesc: Weight: Affects collision results and coin collection
descriptions.handlingDesc: Handling: Kart's turning agility and responsiveness

tips.usage: Usage Tip: Darker progress bar colors indicate higher stats, percentages show relative values compared to maximum for easy comparison between characters and vehicles!
tips.notice: Note: All character and vehicle combinations in-game receive an additional +3 stat bonus. The table shows base stats, actual in-game values may be adjusted.

tooltips.displayStats: Display Stats: Actual stats shown in-game
tooltips.terrainStats: Terrain-specific detailed values: Real performance on each terrain type
tooltips.score: Composite Score: Weighted calculation considering all stats

modal.title: üîç Search Characters & Vehicles
modal.tip1: ‚Ä¢ Supports both English and Chinese name searches
modal.tip2: ‚Ä¢ Supports partial name searches, e.g., 'Mario' will find 'Mario'
modal.startSearch: Start typing to search for characters or vehicles
modal.supportBoth: Supports both English and Chinese name searches
modal.tryOther: Try other keywords or check spelling

combination.autoSave: Auto-save: Created combinations are automatically saved locally and will load on your next visit!

test.success: ‚úÖ Persistence test successful! Combination saved to localStorage
test.failNoData: ‚ùå Test failed: No combination data found in localStorage
test.failNoKey: ‚ùå Test failed: No key found in localStorage
test.title: Persistence Test Tool
test.autoSaveInfo: These combinations should auto-save to localStorage
test.instruction1: Click 'Test Persistence' to add a test combination
test.instruction2: Combinations should persist after page refresh
test.instruction3: Combination data is stored in localStorage under 'mario-kart-combinations' key

recommendations.scoreFormula: Composite Score Calculation: Speed 40% + Handling 30% + Acceleration 20% - Weight 10%
recommendations.ensureDataLoaded: Please ensure character and vehicle data is loaded

instructions.title: üí° Usage Guide
instructions.description: This page provides optimal character and vehicle combinations for different terrain types. Click the buttons below to view recommendations for specific terrains.
instructions.step1: ‚Ä¢ Click terrain buttons (Road, Off-Road, Water) to view optimized combinations
instructions.step2: ‚Ä¢ Each combination shows composite score and detailed stat analysis
instructions.step3: ‚Ä¢ Click 'Add to My Combinations' to save favorite combinations
instructions.step4: ‚Ä¢ Scores are calculated using terrain-specific performance weights

emptyCombination.title: No combinations created yet
emptyCombination.subtitle: Use the selectors above to create your first combination!
emptyCombination.tip: Choose a character and a vehicle, then click the 'Create Combination' button

road.name: Road
road.description: Suitable for regular tracks and paved surfaces

terrain.name: Off-Road
terrain.description: Suitable for off-road and sandy tracks

water.name: Water
water.description: Suitable for water and slippery surfaces
